> 3.  Do not post links to petitions or other calls to action that havenâ€™t been approved by Staff.

In <#1242249109298221069>, can I share links to events from other groups that support Kamala Harris?  For example, from Women For Harris' [National Organizing Call](https://www.facebook.com/womenforbidenharris/posts/pfbid0J4qu2TDPUX3AV6yf8pK8ubfTsxemKippvZvSZSxeMWsTPa8K29p4JQJ91Z3g4992l )?  Or [events co-sponsored](https://www.facebook.com/photo?fbid=901106005381830&set=a.305993331559770) by them (along with DemCast USA, The Democratic Coalition, Field Team Six, Network NOVA, Volunteer Blue, the Women of Color Coalition)?
